                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (18)</h2>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1001.91em, 4.192em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.954em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-78"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1002.05em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.608em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.836em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">
\frac{e^{x+y}}{lnx-1} 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>y</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">x^y=e^{x+y}\Rightarrow ylnx=x+y 
\Rightarrow\frac{y}{x}+lnx\frac{dy}{dx}=1+\frac{dy}{dx}\Rightarrow\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{x-y}{x(lnx-1)} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="width: 1.865em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.529em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1001.53em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-155"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-156"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.529em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-157"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.616em, 1000.67em, 3.877em, -999.998em); top: -4.432em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.673em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.985em; left: -0.073em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.985em; left: 0.002em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.094em, 1000.86em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.91em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\sqrt x</script></span>&nbsp;এর সাপেক্ষে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="width: 1.529em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.231em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.23em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-161"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.231em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                     </div>

\frac{2^xln2}{\sqrt x} </script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="width: 12.83em; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msqrt><mi>x</mi></msqrt><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14"> 
\frac{d({\ 2}^x)}{d(\sqrt x)}=\frac{2^xln2}{\frac{1}{2\sqrt x}}=2^{x+1}\sqrt x.\ ln2\  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x221E;</mi></mrow></munder><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="width: 8.795em;                                     </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-385"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1002.34em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.4em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-392"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∞</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.371em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.848em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>l</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">y= \underset{x\rightarrow-\infty}{\lim}  \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{-\frac{1}{x}}\Rightarrow lny=\ -   \underset{x\rightarrow-\infty}{\lim}  \frac{\ln{\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)}}{x}\\

\Rightarrow lny=\ - \underset{x\rightarrow-\infty}{\lim}  x\left(-\frac{1}{x^2}\right)= \underset{x\rightarrow-\infty}{\lim} \frac{1}{x}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x221E;</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="width: 10.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.77em, 3.076em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-401"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1002.34em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.4em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-407"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∞</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\therefore y= \underset{x\rightarrow-\infty}{\lim}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^{-\ 1/x}=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="width: 12.968em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.62em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.231em, 1010.55em, 2.722em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-431"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.896em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.9em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.896em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">{</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-439"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-441"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-443"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-446"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">}</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\frac{d}{dx}\left\{\ln{\left(secx+tanx\right)}\right\}=? </script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="width: 3.053em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.507em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.46em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-461"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-462"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1001.28em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sec</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 1.277em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-467"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">
\sec^2{x} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="width: 2.416em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.96em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.596em, 1001.91em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-470"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">
secx </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="width: 2.507em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.01em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-476"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.892em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">
tanx </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>sec</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="width: 5.421em; \sec{x}\tan{x} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="width: 21.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1017.38em, 2.748em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-494"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-498"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-512"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-515"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.289em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1005.12em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.58em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-520"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-530"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sec</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.904em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-535"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.36em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.678em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-537"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.29em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.289em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sec</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">
y=\ln(secx+tanx) 
\therefore\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{secxtanx+\sec^2{x}}{secx+tanx}=secx 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="width: 9.093em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1007.38em, 3.169em, -999.998em); top: -2.308em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-553"><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-554"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.455em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1001.38em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.039em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1001.46em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -3.351em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-556"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-564"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-566"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-567"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-569"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.52em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="width: 19.1em; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.33em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.043em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.44em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-633"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-638"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\Rightarrow \underset{x\rightarrow0}{\lim} -x^3=0  </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1003.65em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-644"><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-645"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.043em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.44em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-647"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-650" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-653" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\underset{x\rightarrow0}{\lim}x^3=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="width: 8.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1007.17em, 3.076em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-657"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.043em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.44em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-661"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-669"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-671"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-672"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-674"><span style="display: inline-block;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="width: 1.141em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.913em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1000.91em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-713"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.913em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.41em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.458em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">
e^3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="width: 1.778em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x221E;</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x221E;</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="width: 15.781em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 3.363em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-765"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-766"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\underset{x\rightarrow\infty}{\lim} \left(\frac{x}{x+1}\right)^{-3x}= \underset{x\rightarrow\infty}{\lim}  \left(1+\frac{1}{x}\right)^{3x}=e^3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>x&nbsp;এর সাপেক্ষে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1004.55em, 2.759em, -999.998em);                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
