                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="width: 27.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1022.5em, 3.076em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-848"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-853"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-857"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-859"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-860"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-934" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">y=\tan^{-1}{\frac{a+bx}{b-ax}}=\tan^{-1}{\frac{\frac{a}{b}+x}{1-\frac{a}{b}x}}=\tan^{-1}{\frac{a}{b}+\tan^{-1}{x}} 
\therefore\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{1}{1+x^2} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.734em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.355em, 1004.55em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -4.544em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.308em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-957"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-959"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-961"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.612em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-972"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1004.73em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 4.734em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\underset{h\rightarrow0}{\lim} \frac{f\left(x+nh\right)-f(x)}{nh}=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="width: 21.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.576em, 1017.83em, 3.035em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1009"><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-1010"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1012"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.453em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1005.29em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.662em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1021"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1024"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">lim</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.85em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1041"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1047"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1050"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1052"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.097em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">\underset{h\rightarrow0}{\lim} \frac{\sin{\left(x+nh\right)}-sinx}{nh}= 
\underset{nh\rightarrow0}{\lim}
\cos{\left(x+\frac{nh}{2}\right)}\frac{\sin{\frac{nh}{2}}}{\frac{nh}{2}}=cosx</script></span></p>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>e</mi><mi>x</mi></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.385em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1008.31em, 3.094em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1001.46em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -3.351em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1140"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-size: 70.7%; position: relative; width: 5.032em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.318em, 1004.92em, 4.175em, -999.998em); top: -4.432em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.457em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1145"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1147"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>e</mi><mi>x</mi></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>∵</mo><mfrac><mn>0</mn><mn>0</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>f</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\underset{x \to 0}{\lim} \frac{3e^x+4sinx-e^{-x}}{cosx}=2\ \left[\because \frac{0}{0} \  form\right] </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>n</mi></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="width: 10.567em;                                             <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="width: 2.908em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">f^\prime\left(x\right)=3x^2-6x </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="width: 11.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1009.47em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1391"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\therefore f^\prime\left(1\right)=\ 3-6=-3<0</script></span>;&nbsp;ক্রমহ্রাসমান।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="width: 11.341em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.292em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1009.25em, 2.826em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.558em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">
\left(1-x^2\right)y_2-xy_1=2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.264em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.748em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msubsup><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">
y=\left(\cos^{-1}{x}\right)^2\Rightarrow y_1=2\cos^{-1}{x}.  \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}\\
\Rightarrow\left(1-x^2\right)y_1^2=4y\Rightarrow\left(1-x^2\right)y_2-xy_1=2 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1627" style="width: 8.017em; padding-left: 0.23em;">24</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1635" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1636" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1637" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">30</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.395em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.653em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>51</mn><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>58</mn><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>28</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">f\left(x\right)=ax^2+bx+c;f\left(1\right)=a+b+c=51\ldots(i) \\
f\left(2\right)=4a+2b+c=58\ldots\ldots(ii) \\
f^\prime\left(2\right)=4a+b=0\ldots\ldots(iii) \\
\left(i\right),\ \left(ii\right)\ \&\ \left(iii\right)\Rightarrow a=\ -7,\ b=28,\ c=30 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ট্রেন t&nbsp;সেকেন্ডে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="width: 4.361em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.579em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1003.58em, 2.684em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1769"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1776"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.784em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.243em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.374em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; ট্রেনের বেগ কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="width: 11.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.02em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1819"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1828"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1829" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1832" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1836" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">S=5t+\frac{1}{2}t^2\Rightarrow v=5+t </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1837" style="width: 3.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1002.95em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1838"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1839" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1840" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1843" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\therefore t=2s </script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>f</mi><mi>t</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1844" style="width: 4.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.61em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1845"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1846" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1852"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1853"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1855" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>f</mi><mi>t</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">v=7\ ft/s</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1862" style="width: 2.461em; <p>অর্থাৎ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1889"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1890"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1891" style="font-size: 70.7%; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.97em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1900"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1901" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1905"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1906" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">g(x) </script></span>&nbsp;সর্বনিম্ন।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mi>y</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1944" style="width: 11.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1008.98em, 2.83em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1945"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1946"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1949" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1957"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; \frac{dy}{dx}=\ -\frac{x+2}{y}\therefore m=\ -1 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>x&nbsp;এর কোন মানের জন্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="width: 7.789em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.373em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1006.26em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1969"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1974"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">y=x(x^2-12)</script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;এর চরম মান পাওয়া&nbsp;<br>
যাবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="width: 12.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1010.49em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2001"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2002"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2003"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2006"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2011"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">
\frac{dy}{dx}=3x^2-12=0\Rightarrow x=\pm2 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="width: 11.105em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.093em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1008.98em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2024"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2025" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2026" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2033"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2034" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2035"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2037" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2038" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2040" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">f\left(x\right)=a\cos{(ax+b)}</script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.361em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.29em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2044"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.56em, 4.324em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.635em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2046"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2047"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">f^{10}\left(0\right)=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
