linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2.</mn><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">f^1\left(x\right)=-a^2\sin{\left(ax+b\right)}=a^2\cos{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)} \\
f^2\left(x\right)=-a^3\sin{\left(\frac{\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)}=a^3\cos{\left(\frac{2\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)} \\
f^3\left(x\right)=-a^4\sin{\left(2.\frac{\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)}=a^4\cos{\left(\frac{3\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)}
</script></span></p>

padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2363"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2365"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.371em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>b</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\therefore f^n\left(x\right)=a^{n+1}\cos{\left(\frac{n\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)} \\
\therefore f^{10}\left(x\right)=a^{11}\cos{\left(\frac{10\pi}{2}+ax+b\right)}=-a^{11}\cos{\left(ax+b\right)} \\
\therefore f^{10}\left(0\right)=-a^{11}\cos{b} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (16)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি সমান দৈর্ঘ্যের&nbsp;&nbsp;তারের ব্যাস যথাক্রমে&nbsp;2mm&nbsp;ও&nbsp;5mm.&nbsp;এদের সমান বলে টানা হলে প্রথম তারটির দৈর্ঘ্য বৃদ্ধি দ্বিতীয়টির 4&nbsp;গুণ হয়। কোন তারটি অধিক স্থিতিস্থাপক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mi>r</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5625</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2428" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2429" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.166em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.141em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.397em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>π</mi><mi>r</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.25</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5625</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\frac{Y_1}{Y_2}=\frac{F\times L}{\pi r_1^2\times l_1}\times\frac{{\pi r}_2^2\times l_2}{F\times L}=\frac{6.25\times1}{1\times 4}=1.5625 \\ \therefore Y_1>Y_2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 86px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রের মতো করে 2m দীর্ঘ AB তারের মধ্যবিন্দুতে 5 kg ভরের বস্তু ঝুলালে তারটি আনুভূমিকের সাথে 10° করে নিচে নেমে যায়। এক্ষেত্রে তারের ইয়ং এর গুণাঙ্ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2431" style="width: 7.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.261em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.26em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2432"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2435" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2436"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2437"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2439"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2440"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2441" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2442" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2443"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2444" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2445"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2446"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">2\times{10}^{11}Nm^{-2}</script></span>&nbsp;হলে তারের ব্যাসার্ধ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 90px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.58</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2473" style="width: 24.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(9.469em, 1020.12em, 19.018em, -999.998em); top: -10.285em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2474"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.125em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1008.32em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7.09</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2623"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2624"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2626" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.07</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 10.289em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -10.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 11.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>49</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>10</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.015</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1.015</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2.031</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.031</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.58</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi>π</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7.09</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.07</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">\rm F=5\times9.8=49\ N \\ L=2l=2m\ ;l=1m\ \ \therefore l^\prime=\frac{1}{cos⁡(10°)}=1.015m \\ \therefore L^\prime=2l^\prime=2\times1.015=2.031\ m \\ \therefore ∆l=L'-L=0.031 m ; Y=2×10^{11}Nm^{-2} \\ \therefore Y=\frac{FL}{A\Delta l}\Rightarrow A=\frac{FL}{Y\Delta l}=1.58\times{10}^{-8}\\ \Rightarrow r=\sqrt{\frac{A}{\pi}} \therefore r=7.09\times{10}^{-5}m=0.07\ mm \rm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Y&nbsp;স্থিতিস্থাপক গুণাঙ্কের কোনো তারে P&nbsp;পীড়ন প্রয়োগে একক আয়তনে সঞ্চিত স্থিতিশক্তি কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-137-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="width: 19.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1015.7em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2668"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2669"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2670"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">U</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2701" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2702"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2703" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2704" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2705"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Y</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-137">\rm {U=\frac{1}{2}\times Stress \times Strain =\frac{1}{2}\times P\times\frac{P}{Y}=\frac{P^2}{2Y}}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>0.1 m বাহু বিশিষ্ট অ্যালুমিনিয়ামের তৈরি ঘনকের কোনো তলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-138-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2708" style="width: 4.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.026em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.03em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2709"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2712" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2713"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2714"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2716" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2717" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-138">5\times{10}^6N </script></span>&nbsp;স্পর্শনী বল প্রয়োগ করলে তলটি বিপরীত স্থির তল সাপেক্ষে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>5</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2718" style="width: 1.157em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1000.93em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2719"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2720"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.45em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2722" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2738" style="width: 7.516em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.186em, 1006.15em, 2.325em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2833"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2834"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2835" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>η</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>6</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mn>0.1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><msup><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>9</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\rm \eta=\frac{F}{A\times tan\theta}=\frac{5×10^6}{0.1^2×tan⁡5^o}=5.7×10^9Nm^{-2} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 24 </span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কোনটিই নয়</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Y</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mi>L</mi></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="width: 18.076em; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Y</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mi>L</mi></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">F=\frac{YA l}{L}=\frac{2\times{10}^{11}\times1\times{10}^{-6}\times\frac{5}{100}L}{L}=1\times{10}^4N </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1m দীর্ঘ তারের ব্যাস 5mm, দৈর্ঘ্য বরাবর বল প্রয়োগে ব্যাস 0.01mm হ্রাস পায় এবং দৈর্ঘ্য 2cm বৃদ্ধি পায়। পয়সনের অনুপাত কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 52px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>D</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2944" style="width: 16.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1013.57em, 2.994em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2945"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2947" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2965" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.453em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1004.06em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.047em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2966"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2968" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2969"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2970"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2971"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2972" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2973"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2974"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2975" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2976" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2977" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2978" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1005.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.662em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2979"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2980" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2981" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2982" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2983"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2984"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2985"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2987"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2988"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2989" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2990" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2992" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2993" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2994"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2995"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2996"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2997" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2998"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2999"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3000" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3001" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.45em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.453em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.097em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>σ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>D</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mi>l</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">\Rightarrow \sigma =\frac{\frac{d}{D}}{\frac{l}{L}}=\frac{dL}{Dl}=\frac{0.01\times{10}^{-3}\times1}{5\ \times{10}^{-3}\times2\times{10}^{-2}}=0.1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো বস্তুর উপর প্রযুক্ত আয়তন পীড়ন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3004" style="width: 8.906em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.304em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1007.3em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3005"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3008" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3009"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3010"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3012"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3013"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3014" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3017"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                             <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3062" style="width: 7.288em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 43px;"></p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তারের প্রস্থচ্ছেদের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.003</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="width: 4.361em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.003</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">0.003m^2</script></span>&nbsp;। অসহ পীড়ন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3150" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3153"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3154"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3155" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3156" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 36px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3198" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3199"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3200" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-164">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;অসহভার&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>3.267</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.003</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3201" style="width: 19.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.15em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3202"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.267</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3206" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3207"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3208"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3210" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.003</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3217" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3218"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3219"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3221" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3222" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3225" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3226" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>3.267</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>0.003</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-165">=3.267\times{10}^5\ \times0.003=9.8\times{10}^2N=100kg</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>k বল ধ্রুবকের 5 টি স্প্রিং পরস্পর শ্রেণি সমবায়ে যুক্ত করা হল। তুল্য বল ধ্রুবক-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3227" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.28em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3228"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3231" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-166">5\ k </script></span></p>
</label>

                                        </div>

padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3275" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3276" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3277" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3279" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3280" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">
\frac{1}{k\prime}=\frac{1}{k}+\frac{1}{k}+\frac{1}{k}+\frac{1}{k}+\frac{1}{k}  \therefore k^\prime=\frac{k}{5} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ফাঁপা গোলককে পানি দিয়ে পূর্ণ করে একটি সুতার সাহায্যে ঝুলিয়ে সরল দোলক তৈরি করা হল। এখন, গোলকের তলায় ছিদ্র করে দিলে যদি পানি পড়তে থাকে তাহলে প্রাথমিকভাবে দোলনকালের কী পরিবর্তন হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>একই থাকবে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাড়বে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কমবে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বাড়বে; কারণ, পানি পড়তে থাকলে গোলকের ভরকেন্দ্র নিচে নামতে থাকবে, ফলে কার্যকরী দৈর্ঘ্য বৃদ্ধি পাবে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>আয়তন গুণাঙ্ক এবং কাঠিন্যের গুণাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>18</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3282" style="width: 8.571em;
