                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8.4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8.4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.298</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3320" style="width: 13.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1011.19em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3321"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3324" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.05em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.023em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3325"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3326" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3327" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3329" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3330" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.05em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.023em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3331"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3334" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3335" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.17em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.174em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3338" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.94em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.965em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3339"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3342" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3343" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3344" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3346" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.94em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.965em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3347"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3348" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3350" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3351" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3352" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3353" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.1em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.1em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.298</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>σ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8.4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8.4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.298</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-173">\sigma=\frac{3k-2n}{6k+2n}=\frac{3\times18-2\times8.4}{6\times18+2\times8.4}=0.298 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3436" style="width: 27.379em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো সেকেন্ড দোলকের দোলনকাল পরিবর্তিত হয়ে 2.14s&nbsp; হলো। তাহলে দোলকটি প্রতি ঘন্টায় কত সময় হারাবে?</p>

                                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-181-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>2.14</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3600</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow><mn>3600</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3600</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mn>2.14</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3364.486</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>235.514</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3497" style="width: 27.83em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3364.486</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3523" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">235.514</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3527" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>2.14</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3600</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow><mn>3600</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3600</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3600</mn></mrow><mn>2.14</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3364.486</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>235.514</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-181">\frac{2}{2.14}=\frac{3600-n}{3600}\Rightarrow3600-n=\frac{2\times3600}{2.14}=3364.486 
\Rightarrow n=235.514\ s 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির লিফটে কোনো সরল দোলকের দোলনকাল T ।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3528" style="width: 0.859em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-187-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>T</mi></mrow><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3556" style="width: 16.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.4em, 3.158em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3557"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3558"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3559"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3560" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3562"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3682" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.223em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>60</mn><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.2</mn><mi>s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>T</mi><mo>∝</mo><msqrt><mi>L</mi></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>×</mo><mn>1.2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.7</mn><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">T_1=\frac{60}{50}=1.2s\ ;\ \ T\propto\sqrt L\Rightarrow\ \frac{T_2}{T_1}=\sqrt{\frac{L_2}{L_1}}=\sqrt{\frac{2L_1}{L_1}}=\sqrt2\\ 

\Rightarrow\ T_2=\sqrt2\times T_1=\sqrt2 \times 1.2=1.7s </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (16)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি সবচেয়ে দুর্বল ক্ষারক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>শক্তিশালী অম্লের অনুবন্ধী ক্ষারক দুর্বল।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>H</mi><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3716" style="width: 2.953em; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3719" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3720"><span style="display: inline-block;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1atm&nbsp;চাপে একটি নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রার কয়েকটি পাথরের টুকরোসহ একটি গ্যাসের আয়তন&nbsp;250&nbsp;mL। তাপমাত্রা অপরিবর্তিত রেখে চাপকে&nbsp; 3&nbsp;গুণ করলে ঐ পাথরের টুকরাসহ গ্যাসের আয়তন&nbsp;120&nbsp;mL&nbsp;হয়। পাথরের টুকরার আয়তন কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1026.81em, 5.822em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3724"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1011.11em, 4.387em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3734" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3736" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3739" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3741" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3742" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3744"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3745"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3746" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3747" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3749" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1026.81em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.58em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-3751" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3753" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3755"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3756"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3761" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3765" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3767"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3768"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3769" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3770" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3772" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3775" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.166em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">360</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3783" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3784" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3785" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">55</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3789" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3790" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mo>∴</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>360</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>55</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>L</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">P_1\ \left(V_1-x\right)=P_2\left(V_2-x\right)\\ \Rightarrow\left(V_1-x\right)=3\ \left(V_2-x\right). \therefore250-x=360-3x\therefore x=55\ mL. </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>প্রমাণ অবস্থায়&nbsp;&nbsp;224mL&nbsp;অ্যামোনিয়া গ্যাসে পরমাণুর সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>224</mn><mn>22400</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.02</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2.408</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3836" style="width: 27.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1022.38em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3837"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3838" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3840" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3842" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3843" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3844" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3846" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3848"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3856" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3857" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">224</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6.02</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3862" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3866"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3867"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.408</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3872" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3873"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3874"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3876"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3877"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3878" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>224</mn><mn>22400</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>6.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2.408</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>22</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-199">N=n\times N_A\times\left(1+3\right)=4\times\frac{224}{22400}\times6.02\times{10}^{23}=2.408\times{10}^{22}</script></span>&nbsp;টি</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3879" style="width: 3.773em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.66em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3882"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3883" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3889" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3890"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3891" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3892" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3894" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3895" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>d</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-200">\frac{d_2}{d_1}=\frac{P_2}{P_1}\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3897" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3898"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3899" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;ঘনত্ব পূর্বের তুলনায় 4&nbsp;গুণ হবে অর্থাৎ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3900" style="width: 4.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.94em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3901"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3902"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3904"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\left(4-1\right)=3 </script></span>&nbsp;গুণ বৃদ্ধি পাবে।&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 137px;"></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 41 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন যৌগটির অম্লধর্মীতা আরহেনিয়াস তত্ত্ব দ্বারা ব্যাখ্যা করা সম্ভব?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-211-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4029" style="width: 5.239em;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 42 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1L,&nbsp;3L,&nbsp;4L&nbsp;আয়তনের তিনটি পাত্র একটি নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় যথাক্রমে&nbsp;4,&nbsp;4&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;6atm&nbsp;চাপে গ্যাস দ্বারা পূর্ণ। পাত্র 3&nbsp;টি পরস্পর সংযুক্ত করলে গ্যাসের মোট চাপ কত &nbsp;হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <br>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4116" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4118" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>t</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-215">P_{total}=\frac{\left(1\times4\right)+\left(3\times4\right)+(6\times4)}{1+3+4}=5 atm</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সর্বনিম্ন যে তাপমাত্রায় কোন গ্যাসকে জুল—থমসন প্রভাবে সম্প্রসারিত করলে গ্যাসের তাপমাত্রা কমে যায় তাকে বলে—</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-221-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>298</mn></mrow><mn>303</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>14.75</mn><mi>g</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14.75</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4252" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1010.95em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: 0.781em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-4253" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4254" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4256" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">w</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4258" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4259" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">w</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4262" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4263" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">w</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4267" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.682em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -6.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 7.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>R</mi><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>R</mi><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>298</mn></mrow><mn>303</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>14.75</mn><mi>g</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mo>∆</mo><mi>w</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-221">P_1=P_2,\ V_1=V_2 \\ \therefore n_1R T_1=n_2RT_2\Rightarrow \frac{w_1}{m}\times R\times T_1=\frac{w_2}{m}\times R\times T_2 \\ \Rightarrow w_1T_1=w_2T_2\Rightarrow w_2=\frac{w_1T_1}{T_2}=\frac{15\times 298}{303}=14.75g \\ \therefore ∆w=w_1-w_2=0.25g </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-228-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>N</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>S</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>17</mn><mn>34</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4302" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.412em, 1010.45em, 3.076em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4303"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4304"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1001.39em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4305"><span style="display: inline-block;                         </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8.314</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">293</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.85</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>M</mi></mfrac><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mi>Z</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>138.65</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>29.47</mn><mi>M</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>293</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.85</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-237">PV=\left(\frac{m}{M}RT\right)\times Z\\ \Rightarrow138.65\times{10}^3\times10\times{10}^{-3}=\frac{29.47}{M}\times8.314\times293\times0.85 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-238-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>44.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>44</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4448" style="width: 12.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1010.17em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4449"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4451" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">44.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">44</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4459" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4460" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4461" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4462"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4463" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4464"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4465"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4466" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>44.01</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-238">\Rightarrow M=44.01\approx44\ g\ mole^{-1} </script></span></p>

<p>সুতরাং, গ্যাসটির আণবিক ভর&nbsp;&nbsp;44&nbsp;g&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-239-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4468" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4469"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4470" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-239">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;গ্যাসটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-240-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4471" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4472"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4473" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4474"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4475" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4476" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-240">CO_2</script></span>&nbsp;।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-243-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6.17</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup><mi>J</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4509" style="width: 13.846em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6.17</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
