clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4631"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4632"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4634"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4635"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4636" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4637" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4638" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">J<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4640" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4641" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4642" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4643" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4644" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4645" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4646" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4647"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4648" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-4649"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4650"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4651" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4652" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>K</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>N</mi><mi>A</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8.314</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>298</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6.02</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.17</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup><mi>J</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>l</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-246">E_K=\frac{3RT}{2N_A}=\frac{3\times8.314\times298}{2\times6.02\times{10}^{23}}=6.17\times{10}^{-21}J.molecule^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-252-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><munder><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></mrow><mstyle mathsize=&quot;1.44em&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></munder><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 49 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>&nbsp;একটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-253-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4747" style="width: 1.455em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4814"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4815" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4817" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4818" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">125</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">600</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4821" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mn>125</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>600</mn><mi>K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-261">\frac{P_1}{T_1}=\frac{P_2}{T_2}\therefore T_2=\frac{250\times300}{125}=600K </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রা ও চাপে একটি সরু ছিদ্র দিয়ে একটি অজ্ঞাত গ্যাসের নিঃসরণ হার ঐ একই ছিদ্র দিয়ে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-262-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4822" style="width: 2.386em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.939em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.94em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4823"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4824" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4825"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4826" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4827" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-262">CO_2 </script></span>&nbsp;গ্যাসের নিঃসরণ হারের&nbsp;4.6&nbsp;গুণ হলে, অজ্ঞাত গ্যাসটির আণবিক ভর কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-263-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.6</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>44</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.08</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4828" style="width: 19.1em;                                     </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
